title: The USB-C Price is Right | The Vergecast
description: The Verge's Nilay Patel, David Pierce, and Alex Cranz play a USB-C themed game show for their Holiday Spec-tacular.   Check out the rest of the USB-C Holiday Spec-tacular in our podcast feed:   00:00 - Intro 02:39 - Guess the Price 10:48 - Match Game 18:35 - Mad Libs 25:25 - Showcase   The Vergecast Podcast:  Decoder with Nilay Patel:   Read More:  Community guidelines:
